history.proof: intros s x z H. induction s. - apply H. - right. shelve.

exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> exds s z

Premises:
Ds = fix Ds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : set := match s with | Vs => Vs | Is s0 x => if eq_dart_dec x z then Ds s0 z else Is (Ds s0 z) x end : set -> dart -> set
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
dart = nat : Set
not_exds_Ds_bis : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), ~ exds s z -> ~ exds (Ds s x) z
exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), x <> z -> exds s z < -> exds (Ds s x) z
exds_Ds_diff : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> x <> z
not_exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds (Ds s z) z
not_exds_diff : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> forall t : dart, exds s t -> z <> t
Ds_s : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z < -> Ds s z = s
exds_dec : forall (s : set) (z : dart), {exds s z} + {~ exds s z}
not_exds_Vs : forall s : set, (forall z : dart, ~ exds s z) -> s = Vs
set_rect : forall P : set -> Type, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_ind : forall P : set -> Prop, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_rec : forall P : set -> Set, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
exd_D : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> x <> z -> exd m z < -> exd (D m x) z
cA_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z
cA_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z
cA_cA_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
exd_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (B m k x) z
exd_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (B_1 m k x) z
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
cA_cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
pred_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z <> nil -> exd m z
cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z <> nil -> exd m z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
not_exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA m k z = nil
not_exd_A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A m k z = nil
not_exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = nil
not_exd_A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A_1 m k z = nil
not_exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil

``` 
intros s x z H.
induction s.
- intros [H1 | H1].
  + left. rewrite <- H1. apply H.
  + right. apply H1.
- intros [H1 | H1].
  + left. simpl in H. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [H2 | H2].
    * rewrite H2. apply H1.
    * apply IHs with (z:=z) in H. apply H.
  + right. apply IHs with (z:=z) in H1. apply H1.
```

original: intros s x z H. induction s. - intros [H1 | H1]. + left. rewrite <- H1. apply H. + right. apply H1. - intros [H1 | H1]. + left. simpl in H. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [H2 | H2]. * rewrite H2. apply H1. * apply IHs with (z:=z) in H. apply H. + right. apply IHs with (z:=z) in H1. apply H1.
